Interface RmiService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RmiServer

    public interface RmiService
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Interface para determinar as funções obrigatórias do servidor RMI.
    Since:
    10/01/2013
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Luciano
